javadoc:
Dialog that presents the user with a list of strings and returns the object associated with the user-picked element.

@param opaque object type that will be selected by the user.

methods.name: selectFromList
methods.comment:
Modally shows the user a dialog with a list of strings, and returns the picked object.
 
 (automatically switches to Swing thread)

params.name: list
params.comment: list of object of type T

params.name: toStringFunc
params.comment: func that converts a T into a String.

return.comment: the chosen T object, or null if dialog canceled.

name: SelectFromListDialog
comment:
Dialog that presents the user with a list of strings and returns the object
 associated with the user-picked element.
